name: Keep Running
description: A fun game and casual [/ b] to spend your free time and have fun with your friends as well as challenge them to show who has the most ability [/ b], motor coordination [/ b] and agile reflexes [/ b].
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 (32-bits) Processor: Intel or AMD 1.3Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64-bits) Processor: Intel or AMD with 2.0Ghz or more Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated video card with 512 MB or more DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
